mapper.select: SELECT B.NOTICEID, B.TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(B.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS SENDDATE, C.USERNAME AS SENDER FROM sys970011 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys970010 AS B ON A.NOTICEID = B.NOTICEID LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 AS C ON B.REGUSER = C.USERNO WHERE A.USERNO = #{userno} AND A.READCHEK = 0 LIMIT 10;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalRows FROM ( SELECT A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, C.USERNAME AS FROMUSERNAME, D.USERNAME AS TOUSERNAME, A.REGDATE AS REGDATE FROM sys970010 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys970011 AS B ON A.NOTICEID = B.NOTICEID LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 AS C ON A.USERNO = C.USERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 AS D ON B.USERNO = D.USERNO WHERE B.ISDELETE = 0 AND B.USERNO = #{userno} AND A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.NTCWAYEMAIL = 1 ) AS E
AND E.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND E.FROMUSERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sender},'%')
AND E.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titlecontent},'%') AND E.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{titlecontent},'%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NOTICEID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, C.USERNAME AS FROMUSERNAME, D.USERNAME AS TOUSERNAME, A.IMPORTANT, A.FILESEARCHKEY, DATE_FORMAT(A.REGDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS SENDDATE, A.REGDATE AS SENDDATETIME, A.REGDATE AS REGDATE, B.READCHEK , @RNUM:=@RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM sys970010 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN sys970011 AS B ON A.NOTICEID = B.NOTICEID LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 AS C ON A.USERNO = C.USERNO LEFT OUTER JOIN me800010 AS D ON B.USERNO = D.USERNO ,(SELECT @RNUM := 0) R WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND B.USERNO = #{userno} AND B.ISDELETE = 0 AND A.NTCWAYEMAIL = 1
AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND C.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sender},'%')
AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titlecontent},'%') AND A.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{titlecontent},'%')
order by A.NOTICEID DESC ) AS result
WHERE result.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} ORDER BY result.NOTICEID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE sys970011 SET READCHEK = 1, READDATE = now(), EDTUSER = #{userno}, EDTDATE = now() WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND NOTICEID = #{noticeid} AND USERNO = #{userno} AND ISDELETE = 0
UPDATE sys970011 SET ISDELETE = 2, EDTUSER = #{userno}, EDTDATE = now() WHERE SITEID = #{siteid} AND NOTICEID = #{noticeid} AND USERNO = #{userno} AND ISDELETE = 0
